snippet: MacCRATE--Robert. The Trustees of the William Nelson Cromwell Foundation note with sorrow the passing of their longtime colleague and friend Robert MacCrate, a devoted servant to his profession. George Davidson, Chair; John D. Gordan, III, Secretary; Charles T. Dowling, Treasurer 1/3
lead_paragraph: MacCRATE--Robert. The Trustees of the William Nelson Cromwell Foundation note with sorrow the passing of their longtime colleague and friend Robert MacCrate, a devoted servant to his profession. George Davidson, Chair; John D. Gordan, III, Secretary; Charles T. Dowling, Treasurer 1/3
